revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WL-122 |revision= |upc= |ean=8716502004973 |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/04/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Z-Com |manuf_model=XG-2000 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=M4Y-XG2000 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model=ISL3893 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=AMIC |fla1_model=A29DL320FUV-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Dynachips |ram1_model=D98SD12816AH-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3893 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Sitecom |default_ssid_regex=^Sitecom$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=sitecom |default_pass=sitecom |oui=00:0C:F6 |oui_eth=00:0C:F6 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless Network Broadband Router 100g+'' - '''Home Station'''
"11G Router/AP V1.1", "P/N: 70-490301-11", "2003.10.02", and "12VDC/1A" is silkscreened on the board of the unit populating this entry.
There is no FCC ID on the label.. however, the device is a [[Z-Com XG-2000]]. The FCC ID of the XG-2000 has been assigned to this entry. :The USB portion is depopulated on this model. A spot for a '''Cypress Semiconductor''' SL811HS is visible in between the Flash and RAM.
The EAN on the box is 8716502004973. The EAN on the unit itself is 8716502004003.
The (Euro) power adapter included with the device looks to be a '''Sitecom''' branded SP48-121000 (230VAC ~ 50Hz, 110mA -> 12VDC, 1000mA).
==Additional external links== *[http://isl3893.wikidot.com/sitecom-wl122 On isl3893.wikidot.com] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20070827153526/http://www.von-oppen.com/zope/wiki/main/WlanRouter Personal wiki page recovered via archive.org]
